wikipedia.title: 1935 Gulf Coast longshoremen's strike
wikipedia.summary: The 1935 Gulf Coast longshoremen's strike was a labor action of the International Longshoremen's Association, lasting for about ten weeks from October 1, 1935 through mid-December on the Gulf Coast of the U.S.

wikipedia.title: George Baldanzi
wikipedia.summary: George Baldanzi (January 23, 1907 – April 16, 1972) was an American trade unionist. He was the founding executive vice president of the Textile Workers Union of America (TWUA), and had a rivalry with Emil Rieve, the founding president of the organization.
